committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Capital Markets and Government Sponsored Enterprises

official_title: To provide an exemption for low-revenue companies from certain SEC regulations.

summary.text: Fostering Innovation Act - Directs the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to redefine "accelerated filer" with respect to issuers of securities required to meet accelerated deadlines for filing their Form 10-Q quarterly reports. Requires the SEC to include among accelerated filers any issuers of securities that have: (1) annual revenues in excess of $100 million, and (2) an aggregated worldwide market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates of between $250 million and $700 million.

titles.title: To provide an exemption for low-revenue companies from certain SEC regulations.
